doc.field: The enormous Angkor Wat was built by Suryavarman II in the early 12th century and has become synonymous with Cambodia, its image appearing, amongst other places, on the national flag. Originally a Hindu temple, it has been, and remains, a place of worship for Buddhists since Buddhism became the national religion in the 14th century. Here we are leaving the Angkor Wat area, just as many others are arriving...
asia cambodia angkorwat siemreap angkor angkorthom angkorarchaelogicalpark
